text: Great service and choice of products in the store and the staff were super friendly and efficient with all of our requests. I loved it and it was great to have it done. I will go there for most of my needs.
The cashier is a nice guy who helps us find what we're looking for, and even occasionally cuts open coconuts for us. I come to this place very often and I highly recommend it.
üëçüëçüëç Good collection of South Indian spices and grocery.

10 eggs can cost you a bomb $3.50 whereas NTUC selling only $2.20. (chew brand eggs). Other products have increased sharply. been buying from this shop for almost 10 years. I have washed my hands on this shop. Costly shop . Now I prefer to buy in big quantity from supermarket and market stalls. Senseless increase i should say. Avoid at all cost. Let's see how long more can this shop sustain.

You can find few good Indian brands along with some local brands that can suffice our kitchen needs. Good that they have branches across SG. You can try this before visiting Mustafa to reduce no. Of trips to Mustafa. Let me know if this is helpful.
